seriesJson.title: NER concerts
seriesJson.description: National Educational Radio presents a series of recorded concerts.

node.title: Monteverdi's 400th anniversary, part two
node.description: This program, the second of three parts, presents a concert by the Ambrosian Consort in celebration of the 400th anniversary of the birth of Claudio Monteverdi. It was recorded at Rutgers University in New Brunswick, New Jersey.

node.title: Monteverdi's 400th anniversary, part one
node.description: This program, the first of three parts, presents a concert by the Ambrosian Consort in celebration of the 400th anniversary of the birth of Claudio Monteverdi. It was recorded at Rutgers University in New Brunswick, New Jersey.

node.title: Monteverdi's 400th anniversary, part three
node.description: This program, the third of three parts, presents a concert by the Ambrosian Consort in celebration of the 400th anniversary of the birth of Claudio Monteverdi. It was recorded at Rutgers University in New Brunswick, New Jersey.

node.title: 1967 Mozart Festival, program three, part three
node.description: This program, the third of four parts, presents portions of the 1967 Mozart Festival at Wurzberg.

node.title: 1967 Mozart Festival, program two, part one

node.title: Contemporary Chamber Players play Boulez and more, part three
node.description: This program, the third of three parts, presents a performance by the Contemporary Chamber Players. It was recorded at the University of Chicago, where the group is based. The group performs works by Pierre Boulez and others.

node.title: Riverside Church concert, part four
node.description: This program, the fourth of four parts, presents an organ recital in celebration of the completion of organs at Riverside Church in New York City. It was recorded May 3, 1967.

node.title: University of Illinois concert, part two
node.description: This program, the second of four parts, presents the University of Illinois Symphony Orchestra, Concert Choir, and combined choral ensembles in performance honoring the centennial of the University of Illinois. The concert was recorded at Assembly Hall.
